channel.title: About Marsja Mudde on

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Medieval and Renaissance specialist and soprano Marsja Mudde (Ridderkerk, 1976) was fascinated from an early age by increasingly older classical vocal music. From the start of her singing studies at the Fontys Conservatory in Tilburg, she specialized in the Middle Ages and Renaissance with Dr. Rebecca Stewart, head of the Early Vocal Ensemble Music department. After her extraordinarily successful graduation concert on Saint Michael and All Angels, she followed many more specialization courses at master level.
